data.title: System allowing to make GR in the storage Location which was not extended

qas.question: Dear Experts System is allowing to store the material in the storage location which was not extended in material master in case of CAPITAL PROCUREMENT (i.e., if i enter Account Assignment 'Q' in the PO). For example, material X Is defined with PQR storage location while system shows stok of X in XYZ storage location. But XYZ is not extended for material X. Kindly help me to resolve this issie. Thanks in advance.

answers.text: Hi, This will happen if Your system is configured to have Storage location Automatically while doing any goods movement .In T Code OMB3 this might have been allowed. In this case extending a storage location is not required if the storage location is already there. Dhruba

data.title: The time at which the PO has got saved

qas.question: Hi Frnd, Can i get the time at which the P.O has got saved , is there any table where i can find the time ??? Or any other option available to see the time ???? REgards Rakesh

answers.text: Hi, if you have version management activated then you can get this information when the PO is created with version 0. if not then goto CDHDR table and give the object value as your PO no. and check for the utime and udate for the PO with tcode me21n. regards, Adwait Bachuwar

data.title: which method is easiest for uploading data using LSMW?

qas.question: which method is easiest for uploading data using LSMW (Direct method or batch input method) bcs I am facing lot of problem using batch input method while recording.Even I cannot use direct method using standard program.can anyone tell me some other easiest way for uploading MM01.?

answers.text: Hello TJK, I would vote for direct method, Hello Mohan, The standard SAP LSMW object available to create / update material master record It's easy to map the field using auto field mapping functionality instead of recording method. Object : 0020 Material master Method : 0000 Program Name : RMDATIND Program Type : D Direct Input Hope this helps. Regards Arif Mansuri

data.title: Report list of Sales Orders which have unachievable delivery date

qas.question: Is it possible to pull a list of Open Sales Orders which have a delivery date which cannot be achieved (because there is no Purchase Order with required parts ... or because delivery date of Purchase Order is later than delivery date on Sales Order) I think I am missing something Thanks for any assistance.

answers.text: Hi, Try: Select T0.CardCode, T0.CardName, T0.DocNum, T1.ItemCode From ORDR T0 Join RDR1 T1 ON T1.DocEntry=T0.DocEntry AND T1.LineStatus='O' Join OITM T2 ON T2.ItemCode=T1.ItemCode AND T2.Onhand<T1.Quantity WHERE T1.ItemCode NOT IN (SELECT ItemCode FROM POR1 WHERE ItemCode=T1.ItemCode AND DateDiff(dd,ShipDate,T1.ShipDate)<0) Thanks, Gordon

data.title: how to know which combobox is for series?

qas.question: Hi All, Is there any way to know, on a particular document, which combobox is 'Series' combobox? for marketing documents , its same(item 88). but, for other documents such as that of inventory transactions and incoming/outgoing payments or journal entry (in short , for documents, where numbering series is applicable), the itemuid of series combobox is different. and I will have to hardcode the itemuid of series combo with its respective form. I want to know if I can avoid the hardcoding and dynamically check, which combobox amongst the item's collection, is for series. Any help will be highly appreciated. Thanks and regards, Binita Joshi

answers.text: You should check it through all items in the form as for each item in oform.items next and inside this loop check, if the item is combobox type and if yes, check, if the combo is bounded to Series field in db as ocombo.databind.alias = "series"

data.title: Validation in T Code F-02 in which Bank outgoing GL A/c should be restricte

qas.question: Dear All, Please advice me regarding the following: User is posting the payment to vendor through T Code F-02, resulting in the not creation of the liability. Client wants to stop it by validation in T Code F-02 in which Bank outgoing GL A/c should be restricted, so that user would not be able to post the payment with this T Code. But this Bank GL should not be restricted in BDC for upload to F-02. What should be the Prerequisites, Checks and messages for that? Regards BIJUDAS

answers.text: Hi , Use GGB0 for creating the validation and then activating it in GGB4 . Here you can set the t code i.e F-02 ( FB01 ) and check for all the ougoing GL accounts for that you can create a set in GS01 and put all the accounts for which you want validation and can build a validation for the same . Regards , Dewang

data.title: Is there a report which will show how many times we dipped under safety stock level

qas.question: Example : My Safety stock level quantity is 5000. Can i know many times quantity has come below 5000 in march month.

answers.text: There is not a standard report that will tell you how many times inventory dipped below SS level. You could probably "easily" create one though. You could key off MRP Message 96 ( Stock fallen below safety stock level. 🙂 🙂

data.title: Reverse a delivery which has service item and another item relavent for goods moment

qas.question: Hi All I have a scenario where i can not reverse the PGI I have a delivery which has a item relevant for picking,and Goods moment(PGI) TAN and another item which is a service Item (TAX). i have PGI ed this delivery and now i want to reverse it. In the document flow i see a confirmation of services and goods moment document.when i use VL09 to reverse it ,it doesn't work. Please let me know if there ia way to reverse the PGI and make changes to the delivery. I have gone through some of the threads but could not find a solution. Thanks PM

answers.text: Hello, It is standard behavior to generate a CONFIRMATION OF SERVICE when you do PGI for service Item. you cannot cancel or reverse this confirmation of service using VL09. But TAN item will generate Goods Issue document and can be reversed using VL09, are you saying TAN Item also not getting reversed using VL09? regards, santosh

data.title: Purchase order Cant do MIRO which is integrated with SO

qas.question: Dear all I'm facing current situation, Data Migrate the Purchase order with 3 lines items and 2 items has been done GR/IR. when i do MIRO for the 2 items partial which will refer the Sales document does not exit. Because, when i migrate the sale order 3rd line item is open and so i migrated into SO. Remaining 2 items will not migrated. If you have any clarification Please let me know . So i can elaborate more. What is the solution to do the Miro paritally for those 2 line items without bring any dummy line item in SO with reference to PO. Please guide Thanks

answers.text: your migration was inconsistent, I even wonder how you could get this PO into your system, as I expect that SAP checks the reference made to the sales order items in the account assignment. delete the 2 items from your PO for which you do not have a sales order item, and post the invoice in FI transaction.

answers.text: Hi eileen, You may have to set the job start date and time in the JOB_CLOSE function module parameters: sdlstrtdt - Job start date sdlstrttm - Job start time strtimmed - Start immediately ' ' Regards Wenceslaus

data.title: Assets upload for the year 2008 which alredy closed

qas.question: HI Experts, I have a intresting concept which i want share you. Problem: My clients want to upload some assets values in the local books to the fisical year 2008 which alredy closed. For this i have tried through AS92(LSMW) but all assets are uploaded in the fisical year 2010(current year). How to open the year and how to upload the assets for the year 2008. Please guide me in this case. Thanks&Regards, Dude

answers.text: Hi Dude, generally you have to open the fiscal year in FI-AA and FI and upload the assets with AS91 (AS92 is for changigs). I strongly would recometn you to contact your local consulter. regards Bernhard

data.title: In which table the status of a equipement is stored

qas.question: Hi, In which table the status of a equipement is stored? Thanks in advance Godadhar

answers.text: Hi, Is the status that you are looking for the one that tells if the equipment is installed or Available and so on? If that is the case then: Take the equipment number, then look in table EQUI for the Objekt number for this equipment, table EQUI with key EQUNR (the field EQUI-OBJNR) . With the objekt number look at table JEST. This table contains a relationship of an objekt and its Customer Status asigned to it, this table tells you also which status are active. Once you have the active status you can check table TJ02T to get the description of the status. JEST-STAT = TJ02T-ISTAT Hope this helps Carlos

data.title: which  Bank Clearing Account  should be assigned to account symbol

qas.question: Hi Friends, I have 2 bank clearing accounts , CHECKS OUT ( 113005) AND CHECKS IN (113006) . For the GL account assignment to account symbol, which bank clearing account should be used. I ask because only one bank clearing account GL can be assigned to the account symbol 3. Dont i have to use different GL for BUY & SELL spot transactions. Thanks kamala

answers.text: Hi Kamala, You have to assign your both clearing account 113005 and 113006 to account symbol. In this case you can use more than one account symbol with posting catagory "bank posting in payment currency". So, you must create new account symbol with with posting catagory "bank posting in payment currency" example 3-Out for check out clearing. After that you can assign this new account symbol to suitable posting spec. (or you can crete new posting spec which assigned to suitable update type). Regards, Suryadi.

data.title: Down payment for a PO which has an Order as account assigned object

qas.question: Hi All, I recently faced an issue while making payment for a PO which was account assigned with a Plant maintenance order. System requested for maintaining a Cost Element for Down payment expense. I checked several discussions and responses, all talked about what is the solution i.e. maintain the cost element as its just for information. Also, some referred to a SAP note which tells about a code change needed to switch off the behavior. However, my question is around: a) What if I maintain the cost element, I assume this item will appear in the line item report for my order in CO and will be used in periodic settlement? c) Also, what do if I do not want the item to appear as expense for my order and need not be settled? Is code change the only option? b) Why would SAP default such a config rather than providing an option available for configuration? Thanks, Ankur Goel

answers.text: Hi This is really a critical issue if sap system ask for CE in down payment because it never comes under any exp a/c...I think you must send OSS to solve this issue and not create CE which will be a bad practice and may be landed on other issues Kamal

The moment I include him in a course (E) under D this relationship vanishes from HRP1001 table. After this point I only have relationship A/B 025 between the objects course (E) and person (P). Is there a way by which I can distinguish if this employee had pre-booked? Many thanks in advance. Ajay

data.title: i want to display AP Paymnet advice  raised and which will be recovered on ap ap invoice list

qas.question: Hi to all i tried and write this Query SELECT distinct T0.[DocNum] [DT NO], T0.[DocDate],T1.[Project], T3.[CardCode], T3.[CardName], T1.[TaxCode],T1.[VatSum], T3.[DocNum] [INV NO],T3.[DocDate], T3.[DocTotal] [INV TOTAL], (T1.[Quantity] * T1.[PriceBefDi] ) [DT TOTAL], T2.[DrawnSum] [DPT Amt Hold INV],((T1.[Quantity] * T1.[PriceBefDi] )-T2.[DrawnSum]) [DPT DUE FOR INV]FROM ODPO T0 INNER JOIN DPO1 T1 ON T0.[DocEntry] = T1.[DocEntry] INNER JOIN PCH9 T2 ON T0.[DocEntry] = T2.[BaseAbs] INNER JOIN OPCH T3 ON T2.[DocEntry] = T3.[DocEntry] INNER JOIN PCH1 T4 ON T3.[DocEntry] = T4.[DocEntry] WHERE T0.[DocDate]>=[%1] AND T0.[DocDate] <=[%2] on the above Query bisplayed only which will recovered on Ap invoice list but i want both the list like raised and recovered .. please sugget me logic which i missed thanks for advance help --Ramudu

answers.text: Try This SELECT distinct T0.[DocNum] [DT NO], T0.[DocDate],T1.[Project], T3.[CardCode], T3.[CardName], T1.[TaxCode],T1.[VatSum], T3.[DocNum] [INV NO],T3.[DocDate], T3.[DocTotal] [INV TOTAL], (T1.[Quantity] * T1.[PriceBefDi] ) [DT TOTAL], T2.[DrawnSum] [DPT Amt Hold INV],((T1.[Quantity] * T1.[PriceBefDi] )-T2.[DrawnSum]) [DPT DUE FOR INV]FROM ODPO T0 INNER JOIN DPO1 T1 ON T0.[DocEntry] = T1.[DocEntry] Left Outer JOIN PCH9 T2 ON T0.[DocEntry] = T2.[BaseAbs] INNER JOIN OPCH T3 ON T2.[DocEntry] = T3.[DocEntry] INNER JOIN PCH1 T4 ON T3.[DocEntry] = T4.[DocEntry] WHERE T0.[DocDate]>=[%1] AND T0.[DocDate] <=[%2]
